segments.text: I notice the boy balancing on that stool, and it makes me nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s stretching so far to reach the cookies, and the stool is already tilting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for a cookie like nothing’s wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she should be helping him instead of just watching.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is drying dishes like nothing is happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn’t even see the water spilling everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’s ever going to look up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing, and she’s just standing there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is getting soaked, and she doesn’t care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think this is going to end badly.
segments.speaker: PAR
